Description:
Job summary: Wholesales Specialist (Bring new customers, maintain them and achieve their goals).ResponsibilitiesKnowledge and understanding of the coffee industry & FMCG.
Prepare the work plan of the daily visit and present it to the responsible manager.
Daily visit to the clients to make orders and collection.
Make daily visits reports.
Check the competitor's activities in the market and report the managements on daily basis.
Set a schedule for visits and always place alternatives in case an appointment fails.
Trying to close the sale on the first visit, so all sales-related papers must be available.
Receiving perpendicularity from customers
Follow customers during intermittent periods and maintain the lowest levels of relationship.
Achieving the desired sales target
Direct customers towards the product and services provided by the company that the customer does not buy or are not convinced of and try to increase the company's sales through this directive.
Do any other related tasks assigned to them by their immediate boss.QualificationsDegree in marketing or business or any related field.
Arabic & English language needed.Skills
Skills:
Minimum of 2-3 years working experience, ideally within FMCG, Wholesale.
Self-motivated, driven, energetic with a drive to achieve results.
Strong follow-up skills and determination to succeed.
KSA Driving License is required.
